timeSelect: Your time is precious and exploration should never come at a price. By telling us how much time you have on hand, we can help you find new things to check out without upsetting schedules or other commitments
feelingSelect: The heart wants what it wants and the perfect break is the one that gives you exactly what you need at the moment. By telling us how you feel you can better help us identify the right pin for you.
spider: Why take just our word for it? Using our visual aid, you can see how our other users feel about the pins you see and better decide if this is what you really want to see at the moment.
